channel.title: yudel tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from yudel.

item.description: @joshtpm Going after the Times? Sad to see him steal Seth Lip sky’s shtick.
item.source:markdown: @joshtpm Going after the Times? Sad to see him steal Seth Lip sky’s shtick.

item.description: In discussing efforts to use coercive control legislation to help agunot, @ORAAgunot said they were also hearing concern about that approach. This thread from Australia looks at the downsides. https://t.co/syNwMXjJj8
item.source:markdown: In discussing efforts to use coercive control legislation to help agunot, @ORAAgunot said they were also hearing concern about that approach. This thread from Australia looks at the downsides. https://t.co/syNwMXjJj8

item.description: @elivalley Game theory says someone needs to put a horse head in his daughter’s bed.
item.source:markdown: @elivalley Game theory says someone needs to put a horse head in his daughter’s bed.

item.description: @TheLincoln I recall a NYT Book Review piece many years ago arguing that actually reading the books you own shows a lack of faith in the authors. I assume it was tongue in cheek but I’ve lived by it ever since.
item.source:markdown: @TheLincoln I recall a NYT Book Review piece many years ago arguing that actually reading the books you own shows a lack of faith in the authors. I assume it was tongue in cheek but I’ve lived by it ever since.

item.description: @michaelharriot I hope you’ll risk the wrath of Paramount’s lawyers by telling us about the voyages of the slave ship Enterprise.
item.source:markdown: @michaelharriot I hope you’ll risk the wrath of Paramount’s lawyers by telling us about the voyages of the slave ship Enterprise.

item.description: Your occasional reminder that Christian videos dominate YouTube searches for Passover because a brilliant project of Jewish animation with a budget of under a million a year never found steady funding. https://t.co/z58lWMBeCo

item.description:
@EladNehorai I’m sure the millions of dollars spent on primary campaigns by an alliance of pro-Israel, pro-fossil fuel, and Big Pharma supporters will turn Generation Z around lickety-spit.

@EladNehorai And I’m sure the attention being paid to Andy Levin’s race will convince them that the Jewish community welcomes them even if they depart from Likud orthodoxy on the Palestinians.
item.source:markdown:
@EladNehorai I’m sure the millions of dollars spent on primary campaigns by an alliance of pro-Israel, pro-fossil fuel, and Big Pharma supporters will turn Generation Z around lickety-spit.
@EladNehorai And I’m sure the attention being paid to Andy Levin’s race will convince them that the Jewish community welcomes them even if they depart from Likud orthodoxy on the Palestinians.

item.description: @AkivaMCohen “It’s people. All the way down.”
item.source:markdown: @AkivaMCohen “It’s people. All the way down.”

item.description: Nice anti-Nazi detective work in the thread, but in the middle you can see the Nazi going after one of Libs of TikTok’s targets… with an antisemitic banner. Someone might want to show this to any grownup Chabadniks that Chaya associates with. https://t.co/QTSFQF8MjH

item.description: @shiraaahh Because they take their cues from our leaders. And are leaders don’t want to fight covid, because they don’t want to be seen as political. And covid is political because Rupert Murdoch and the Republicans politicized it. As for why they did that — see my pinned tweet.
item.source:markdown: @shiraaahh Because they take their cues from our leaders. And are leaders don’t want to fight covid, because they don’t want to be seen as political. And covid is political because Rupert Murdoch and the Republicans politicized it. As for why they did that — see my pinned tweet.
